channel.title: Comments on: jQuery 1.5, jquery.validate and Ajax/getJSON

item.title: By: Marcus
item.dc:creator: Marcus
item.description: Since you've been through this: Which steps do I need to take to upgrade to jQuery 1.5 in my MVC3 project? Care to fill me in a bit about which files you replaced etc? Thanks.
item.content:encoded: Since you’ve been through this: Which steps do I need to take to upgrade to jQuery 1.5 in my MVC3 project? Care to fill me in a bit about which files you replaced etc? Thanks.
